title: The Horses of Shackleford (Premium)
description:
This is a preview episode. Get the full episode, and many more, ad free, on our supporter's feed: https://getsleepy.com/support.
The Horses of ShacklefordTonight, Abbe tells the heartwarming story of Molly and her very unique friend, Diamond. 😴 
Sound design: ferry across the bay.

itunes:title: The Horses of Shackleford (Premium)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: Narrated by Abbe Opher.  Molly makes an unexpected, lifelong friend on her family's summer vacation.
